description: The Japanese cobra lily (Arisaema kishidae 'Silver Pattern') is an amazing plant species, with its bright silver and green striped foliage and large cobra-like flower spikes. It is known for its ability to thrive in partial to full shade gardens and to tolerate a variety of soil types. Its large leaves can reach up to three feet in length, creating a lush, tropical environment that will provide color and depth to any garden. During the autumn season, the blossom of this lily reaches up to a foot in length and will provide a unique and eye-catching display to any surrounding. With its stunning foliage, resilient nature, and easy maintenance requirements, the Japanese cobra lily is an amazing plant species for any garden.
